name: Doctor's Remote
effect: Explodes monsters in a 3x3 area around the selected tile
creator: DoctorHummer

name: The Poop
effect:
Spawns a random poop on the selected tile
sed for Brown Ritual
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Telepathy For Dummies
effect: Gives babies' projectiles a homing effect similar to Little Steven's
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Monster Manuel
effect: Summons a random baby on the tile it is used on, including babies that haven't been obtained in the current run
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Sacrificial Altar
effect: Kills the chosen baby and returns back 100% of it's cost. Babies killed with Sacrificial Altar will release a circle of damaging pellets (the amount of shots and their damage depends on baby's value)
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Friend Ball
effect: Lets the player catch enemies and later release them charmed
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Glowing Hourglass
effect: Sends all monsters back to the start of the lane, including charmed ones
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Moving Box
effect: Allows the player to store a baby that carries between levels/stages and place it elsewhere
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Red Candle
description: Destroys an entire line of monsters
effect: Instantly kills a lane of monsters
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Blue Candle
description: Destroys an entire column of monsters
effect: Instantly kills a column of monsters Also can be used to buff Crispy Baby, Deserter and Paschal Candle
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Notched Axe
effect: Breaks monsters and babies out of amber/ice. Can also be used to destroy Stoners and Hardies. Each destroyed obstacle grants a heart if combined with Red Shovel
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Snowglobe
description: Temporarily freezes all enemies on screen
effect: Freezes all enemies on the board
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Breath Of Life
description: Brings fallen babies back to life
effect: Lets the player revive a dead baby
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Candy Heart
description: Starts with more hearts, sacrificing your active slot
effect: Start each level with 150 more hearts
creator: DoctorHummer
